## tail variable

Returns all but the first element of the given list or string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tail: {
    (val: string): string;
    <T extends unknown[]>(val: T): T;
}
```

## Example 1


```ts
// String
tail('hello') // 'ello'
tail('h') // ''
tail('') // ''

```

## Example 2


```ts
tail([1, 2, 3]) // [2, 3]
tail(['hello', 'world']) // ['world']
tail(['hello']) // []
tail([]) // []

```
